```{r map, include=TRUE, warning=FALSE}
EventDS <- read.csv("EventPlotly.csv", na.strings=c("NA","","#DIV/0!"), header=TRUE)

g <- list(
  scope = 'usa',
  showland = T,
  landcolor = toRGB("gray90"),
  showcountries = F,
  subunitcolor = toRGB("white"),
  showlegend = TRUE)
  
EventMap <- plot_geo(EventDS) %>%
  add_markers(x = ~Longitude, y = ~Latitude, color = I("blue"), alpha = 0.5,
            text=~paste("Invited = ",Invited, "Attending = ", Coming)) %>%
  layout(geo = g) 
  ##layout(geo = g, title = "Event Invitees<br>October 16, 2016")

EventMap

```
